Research

Published

Bryant, Andrew, and Lendie Follett. 2022. “Hunger Relief: A Natural Experiment from Additional SNAP Benefits During the COVID-19 Pandemic.” The Lancet Regional Health-Americas 10: 100224.
Coetzee, Johann F, Drew R Magstadt, Pritam K Sidhu, Lendie Follett, Adlai M Schuler, Adam C Krull, Vickie L Cooper, Terry J Engelken, Michael D Kleinhenz, and Annette M O’Connor. 2019. “Association Between Antimicrobial Drug Class for Treatment and Retreatment of Bovine Respiratory Disease (BRD) and Frequency of Resistant BRD Pathogen Isolation from Veterinary Diagnostic Laboratory Samples.” PloS One 14 (12): e0219104.
Follett, Lendie, Andrew Bryant, Daniel Beck, and Sarai Rice. 2022. “Investigating the Short and Long-Term Effects of ‘Nutritional-Score’ Pricing on Food Pantry Selections.” Appetite 168: 105692.
Follett, Lendie, Simon Geletta, and Marcia Laugerman. 2019. “Quantifying Risk Associated with Clinical Trial Termination: A Text Mining Approach.” Information Processing & Management 56 (3): 516–25.
Follett, Lendie, and Heath Henderson. 2023. “A Hybrid Approach to Targeting Social Assistance.” Journal of Development Economics 160: 103002. https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jdeveco.2022.103002.
Follett, Lendie, and Brian Vander Naald. 2020. “Explaining Variability in Tourist Preferences: A Bayesian Model Well Suited to Small Samples.” Tourism Management 78: 104067.
Follett, Lendie, and Cindy Yu. 2019. “Achieving Parsimony in Bayesian Vector Autoregressions with the Horseshoe Prior.” Econometrics and Statistics 11: 130–44.
Geletta, Simon, Lendie Follett, and Marcia Laugerman. 2019. “Latent Dirichlet Allocation in Predicting Clinical Trial Terminations.” BMC Medical Informatics and Decision Making 19 (1): 1–12.
Henderson, Heath & Lendie Follett. n.d. “Targeting Social Safety Net Programs on Human Capabilities.” World Development (Forthcoming).
Henderson, Heath, and Lendie Follett. 2020. “A Bayesian Framework for Estimating Human Capabilities.” World Development 129: 104872.
Hofmann, Heike, Lendie Follett, Mahbubul Majumder, and Dianne Cook. 2012. “Graphical Tests for Power Comparison of Competing Designs.” IEEE Transactions on Visualization and Computer Graphics 18 (12): 2441–48.
Loy, Adam, Lendie Follett, and Heike Hofmann. 2016. “Variations of q–q Plots: The Power of Our Eyes!” The American Statistician 70 (2): 202–14.
McCord, David, Michi Matsukura, and Lendie Follett. 2019. “Differentiating Higher Level Homicides: An Empirical Analysis of the Impacts of Legal Definitions in the Real World, Plus an Illumination of the Understudied Crime of Second-Degree Murder.” Drake L. Rev. 67: 679.
Wilcoxson, Jordan, Lendie Follett, and Sean Severe. 2020. “Forecasting Foreign Exchange Markets Using Google Trends: Prediction Performance of Competing Models.” Journal of Behavioral Finance 21 (4): 412–22.
